rows.label: tlk70000035_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I always knew he was a bit touched in
the head, but I didn't think Leo's
willpower went this far.

rows.label: tlk70000035_03_msg0002
rows.name:
When Metsu came a-knocking,
I thought I would die right then and
there. Not him, though.

rows.label: tlk70000035_03_msg0003
rows.name:
He said it was times like these when
music is most important and that we
couldn't just stand idly by.

rows.label: tlk70000035_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Everything was a blur after that. We
helped people running about like
headless chickens trying to escape.

rows.label: tlk70000035_03_msg0005
rows.name:
We're still trying to help, in our own
way - performing for scared, crying
kids and worried people.

rows.label: tlk70000035_03_msg0006
rows.name:
We probably don't get through to most
of them, but what got through to me
more than anything was Leo's courage.
